snippet: Many political candidates have changed, over time, on key issues, but Rob Astorino, the Republican candidate for New York governor, is basically the same steadfast conservative that he was at 18.
abstract: Rob Astorino, Republican trying to unseat New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo, is basically same steadfast conservative Catholic that he was at age 18, when he struck people as an unusually mature activist; anyone who has crossed paths with him at virtually any stage of his career, first in radio and now in politics, sums him up as either principled and moralistic or rigid and parochial, but never evolving.
lead_paragraph: Many political candidates have changed, over time, on key issues, but Rob Astorino, the Republican candidate for New York governor, is basically the same steadfast conservative that he was at 18.

headline.main: Cuomo’s Rival a Conservative Since Day One
headline.print_headline: Cuomo’s Rival a Conservative Since Day One
